You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &lopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Lopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D543.
  * `&lopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D55D.
